Name: 12 Labours of Hercules XI: Painted Adventure
About the game: What would you do if once you found yourself in Ancient Greece? Young Emma always knew an answer to this question: she would meet Hercules and join his incredible adventures. But how can a common girl from the 21st century help the brave hero? Emma has magic art supplies, and everything she paints becomes real! Does Hercules need a bridge, a ship or dumbbells? All Emma needs is to use her imagination and artistâ€™s talent! Play 56 thrilling levels Paint and erase everything you need! Explore sublevels, bonus levels and super bonus levels. Easy to learn, hard to master: many ways to complete a level. Accompany Hercules and Emma during their artistic labour! Travel through the time to Ancient Greece and back! Stunning full HD graphics. Interactive guide. Wallpapers. Additional bonus levels. Hercules in the 21st century.
